trans-unit.source: The title of the stage. Shown in the header of the notification.
The text shown with this stage note.
Which context should trigger this note?
The host on which the stage note is shown.
The color of the stage note.
The size of the stage note. Whether to show only the header or also show the body.
Determines the position of the stage note. There are mutliple options where to show the notes.
